message:
It's very difficult to work on code in blog comments. I recommend you post on a site like Stack Overflow and then send me a link to your question.

In general, you should:  
- Replace all ContinueWith calls with await.  
- Not block on asynchronous code (i.e., use Task.WhenAll instead of Task.WaitAll).  
- For console apps, have a single point in Main where you do wait; it's common to structure this as "MainAsync().Wait()" where MainAsync is the asynchronous equivalent of Main.
